statements: DELETE FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM project_progress WHERE assigned_to = 'John Doe' AND deadline < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM project_progress WHERE completion_status = false;
DELETE FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = false;
DELETE FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assigned_to='John' AND deadline < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE AND deadline < '2022-02-15';
DELETE FROM Deadlines WHERE deadline_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
DELETE FROM deadlines WHERE deadline_id IN (SELECT deadline_id FROM task_assignments WHERE deadline < '2023-12-31');
DELETE FROM completion_status WHERE status_id IN (SELECT status_id FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE);
DELETE FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM deadlines WHERE reminder_date < CURRENT_DATE;
DELETE FROM project_tasks WHERE project_id NOT IN (SELECT project_id FROM projects);
